thread.title: V&A volunteers star next to Daniel Day-Lewis in 'Phantom Thread'

title: V&A volunteers star next to Daniel Day-Lewis in 'Phantom Thread'
text:
V&A volunteers star next to Daniel Day-Lewis in 'Phantom Thread' 6:41pm GMT - 01:47 
From sewing machine to silver screen: meet the amateurs who acted with Day-Lewis. Rough Cut (No reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
